alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 11:44AM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 5500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory above 5500 feet, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory above 5500 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado, Shonto and Window Rock. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast from 11 AM Today to 5 PM Today: Buffalo Pass 0 to 1 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Shonto 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
